author: cihan
msg: STANBOL-191: Added three modes to DobjectAdapter; OFFLINE, ONLINE, TOLERATED_OFFLINE. In ONLINE mode when an operation that requires repository access fails, a exception will be thrown.In TOLERATED_OFFLINE in case of an exception adapter will revert to OFFLINE mode.
